hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select REFERENCEFIELD "referencefield" ,REFERENCEVALUE "referencevalue" ,DESCRIPTION "description" from REFERENCEFIELDVALUES where REFERENCEFIELD = :p_referencefield AND REFERENCEVALUE = :p_referencevalue

select REFERENCEFIELD "referencefield" ,REFERENCEVALUE "referencevalue" ,DESCRIPTION "description" from REFERENCEFIELDVALUES where REFERENCEFIELD = ISNULL(:p_referencefield,referencefield) AND REFERENCEVALUE = ISNULL(:p_referencevalue,referencevalue) and UPPER(ISNULL(description,'xxx')) like '%' + ISNULL(:p_description,UPPER(description)) + '%' order by description

select CAST(referencefield AS VARCHAR(2)) "referencefield" ,CAST(referencevalue AS VARCHAR(12)) "referencevalue" ,CAST(description AS VARCHAR(30)) "description" from REFERENCEFIELDVALUES where REFERENCEFIELD = :p_referencefield order by REFERENCEVALUE ASC

select CAST(referencefield AS VARCHAR(2)) as "referencefield", CAST(screentitle as VARCHAR(30)) "screentitle", CAST(length AS DECIMAL(10,3)) as "length", CAST(tablevalidatedflag as VARCHAR(1)) as "tablevalidatedflag", CAST(localname as VARCHAR(30)) as "localname", CAST(englishname as VARCHAR(30)) as "englishname", CAST(internalcodeflag as VARCHAR(1)) as "internalcodeflag", CAST(availableflag as VARCHAR(1)) as "availableflag", CAST(internalcode as VARCHAR(10)) as "internalcode" From REFERENCEFIELDMST where REFERENCEFIELD = :p_referencefield
